How to play each Game Mode:

 	1. Square Game - Simple: All pieces must be placed in their correct spot.
 	2. Square Game - Shell: First piece must be placed on the edge. After that, each piece must be connected to a fixed one.
 	3. Square Game - One piece: The corners are already fixed. One at a time, a piece will appear on the screen and it must be placed in its correct spot.
 	4. Jigsaw Game: The classic game, all pieces must be connected to form the full image.

 The player wins when the full image is formed, no matter the game mode.



Also, before each game, the player must choose:

 	- the puzzle dimensions by entering row and column number
 	- a game mode from the list
 	- an image, either from the default image list or from the personal gallery
